nodes.text: Dahar was a male Human who worked for the Hutt Cartel during the Galactic War. During the Quesh war, he was among the Cartel forces deployed to aid the reconstituted Sith Empire on the planet Quesh in response to the Three Families' allying withe Galactic Republic. Dahar was stationed at the Imperial Garrison.
Dahar appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Crew Skill Trade Vendor for Imperial players on Quesh.
